column4: Is there a way to run "sudo iwconfig wlan0 essid "NETWORKx"" at startup? I'm trying to get my laptop to connect at startup. I also would like to set my network as the preferred network.
it should really be specified in /etc/networking/
Would I just put wlan0 essid "NETWORKx" in? or do I have to include iwconfig?
